overview: Bir-Bikram 2 is a 2019 Nepali Romantic love story movie starring Paul shah, Barsha Shiwakoti, Najir Hussein and Buddi Tamang in key roles and is the second installment/franchise of smashing hit movie Bir-Bikram (2016). This tale is about the journey of their friendship, love and roller coster life.
title: Bir Bikram 2
